command_line: addthreads=${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} && (( addthreads-- )) &&   addmemory=${GALAXY_MEMORY_MB_PER_SLOT:-768} && ((addmemory=addmemory*75/100)) &&   ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/e/2/e/dataset_e2ef5a09-9503-42bd-a41e-9d02d54f8c65.dat' reference.fa && samtools faidx reference.fa &&   ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/2/5/6/dataset_2564fe8c-2d7f-42b9-8571-3ac134c10989.dat' infile &&         samtools view -@ $addthreads -C      -o outfile  --output-fmt-option no_ref   -T 'reference.fa' -t 'reference.fa.fai'   infile
